name: Marrow Kart - Sam Osborne
description:
Marrow Kart lets you drive around a selection of high quality tracks while competing for the best possible time. Kart racing has never been more exciting! 

The features of this game include:

• Create your own tracks using Course Creator
• Share your created tracks with your friends
• Compete with others to get the highest scores and win exciting prizes
• 13 Unique high-quality Tracks
• 36 Characters to unlock
• Collect Krystals on tracks to spend in the shop
• Level up your characters to get more Krystals
• Exciting in-game music
• Unlock new karts in the shop
• View your best times for each track
• Play unique game modes such as "Coin Rush", "Grid Runners" and "Wheel Spin"
